posts.post_content:
Hey All,

Lot Sold!  thanks for the PM's!

have a lot of nine beaters (includes t202 center panel), there is a trimmed Joss Portrait in the lot.  
LOT SOLD!

  any form of payment is fine.  first "I'll take it" takes precedents over negotiations.  Not a T206 guy (other than backs) so doesn't fit into my collection.

PM or email.  thanks!  Cliff
